targets.rawSql:
SELECT a.nombre::Text "CODIGO CASO",
    	e.cedula::Text "CEDULA",
    	e.nombre::TEXT "DENUNCIANTE",
    	e.telefono::Text "TELEFONO",
    	b.nombre::Text "ESTADO",
    	c.nombre::Text "MUNICIPIO",
    	d.nombre::Text "PARROQ",
    	a.descripcion::TEXT "DESCRIP", 
	  	f.name::Text "CATEGORIA",
	  	g.name::Text "SUBCATEG",
	  	case when m.name is null then 'Sin ExtCateg' else m.name end::Text "EXTCATEG", 
		i.nombre::Text "ESTATUS",
		to_char(a.fecha, 'dd-mm-YY  hh:mm:ss')::Text "FECHA",
		to_char(a.fecha_registro,'dd-mm-YY hh:mm:ss') as "FECHA ESTATUS",
       case when k.nombre is null then 'Analizando' else k.nombre end::Text "INSTITUCION",
		k.nombre::Text "RESPONSABLE"
        FROM gestion.caso a
            inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
            inner join gestion.municipio c on c.id = a.id_municipio
            inner join gestion.parroquia d on d.id = a.id_parroquia
            inner join gestion.denunciante e on e.id = a.id_denunciante
            inner join gestion.category f on f.id = a.id_categoria
            inner join gestion.category g on g.id = a.id_sub_categoria
            left JOIN  gestion.category m ON m.id = a.id_extra_categoria
            inner JOIN  gestion.estatus i ON a.id_estatus = i.id            
            inner JOIN  gestion.responsable j ON j.id_caso = a.id
            inner JOIN  gestion.resolutorio k ON k.id = j.id_resolutorio
      where  j.id_resolutorio in (354)
      and j.principal is true
      and a.id_estatus in (3,4,8)

panels.title: LISTADO DE CASOS  DE LA BASE DE DATOS
LISTADO DE CASOS  DE VIALIDAD EN LA BASE DE DATOS

targets.rawSql:
SELECT count(a.id)
	FROM gestion.caso a
    inner join gestion.category c on c.id = a.id_sub_categoria
    where a.id_sub_categoria in (48)

SELECT count(a.id)
	  FROM gestion.caso a
    inner join gestion.category c on c.id = a.id_sub_categoria
    where a.id_sub_categoria in (48)
    and a.id_origen = 1
    and a.id_estatus in (5)

-- Casos Recibidos
 SELECT count(a.id)
	  FROM gestion.caso a
    where a.id_sub_categoria in (48)
    and a.id_origen = 2
    and a.id_estatus not in (5)

-- Casos Cerrados
 select 
          ec.tx_nom_edo_caso::Text estatus,
          d.tx_nom_sub_categoria::Text servicio,
          count(c.id_caso)::Text subtotal,
          (select count(*) from caso where id_edo_caso in (7))::Text Total
        from 
            caso c 
            inner join edo_caso ec on c.id_edo_caso = ec.id_edo_caso 
            inner join public.caso_sub_categoria d on d.id_caso_sub_categoria = c.id_caso_subcateg
        where 
            ec.id_edo_caso in (7)
            GROUP BY ec.tx_nom_edo_caso, servicio;

SELECT count(a.id)
	FROM gestion.caso a
    inner join gestion.category c on c.id = a.id_sub_categoria
    where a.id_sub_categoria in (48)
    and a.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8)

SELECT count(a.id)
FROM gestion.caso a
inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
where b.id_resolutorio in (359) 
and b.principal is true
and a.id_estatus in (3,4,6,7,8)

SELECT count(a.id)
FROM gestion.caso a
inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso = a.id
where b.id_resolutorio in (359) 
and b.principal is true
and a.id_estatus in (3,4,7,8)

SELECT count(a.id)
FROM gestion.caso a
inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso = a.id
where b.id_resolutorio in (354) 
and b.principal is true
and a.id_estatus in (20) 
and a.verificado is null 
and (a.feedback < 3 or a.feedback is null)

SELECT count(a.id)
FROM gestion.caso a
inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso = a.id
where b.id_resolutorio in (354) 
and b.principal is true
and a.id_estatus in (20) 
and (a.feedback >= 3   or  a.verificado = 'SI')

SELECT trunc(count(a.id)::decimal * 100 / (SELECT count(a.id)
                                           FROM gestion.caso a
                                           inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
                                           where b.id_resolutorio in (354) 
                                           and b.principal is true
                                           and a.id_estatus in (3,4,6,7,8))::decimal, 2) as porcentaje
    FROM gestion.caso a
    inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
    where b.id_resolutorio in (354)
    and b.principal is true
    and a.id_estatus in (20)
    and (a.feedback >= 3   or  a.verificado = 'SI');

--Total de Casos por Fecha
  select to_char(a.fecha, 'YY-mm-dd') as fechao, to_char(a.fecha, 'dd-mm-YY') as fecham, count(a.fecha) as total
    	from gestion.caso a
    	where a.fecha > CAST(now()::timestamp AS DATE) - CAST('15 days' AS INTERVAL) 
    		and a.id_sub_categoria in (48)
		    and a.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8)
        group by fecham, fechao
        order by fechao

panels.title: HISTÓRICO DE CASOS RECIBIDO EN EL SISTEMA DESDE LA VENAPP (ÚLTIMOS DÍAS)

targets.rawSql:
-- Total de Casos por Estado
select b.nombre as estado, count(a.id) as total
    from gestion.caso a
	 inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
	 where a.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8)
	 and a.id_sub_categoria in (48)
    group by estado
    order by total desc
    Limit 10;

panels.title: ESTADOS CON MAYOR NUMERO DE CASOS EN EL SISTEMA

targets.rawSql:
select b.nombre as estado, count(a.id) as total
    from gestion.caso a
	 inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
	 where a.id_sub_categoria in (48) 
	 and a.id_estatus in (20)
    group by estado
    order by total desc
    Limit 10;

panels.title: ESTADOS CON MAYOR NUMERO DE CASOS ATENDIDOS
REPORTE GENERAL DE LOS CASOS DE VIALIDAD

targets.rawSql:
select count(a.id) as TOTAL
	from gestion.caso a
	  where  a.id_sub_categoria in (48) 
	        and a.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8)

select count(*) as TOTAL
                from gestion.caso a
				    where a.id_sub_categoria in (48) and 
                a.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8)
				        and a.id_extra_categoria is not null

select count(*) as TOTAL
      from gestion.caso a
			 where a.id_sub_categoria in (48) and 
            a.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8) and a.id_extra_categoria is null

SELECT case when m.name is null then c.name else m.name end as sub_categoria, COUNT(a.id) as total 
	         FROM gestion.caso a 
                inner join gestion.category c on c.id = a.id_sub_categoria
				    LEFT JOIN  gestion.category m ON m.id = a.id_extra_categoria   
            where c.id in (48) and  a.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8)
            GROUP BY sub_categoria
            ORDER BY total desc;

SELECT i.nombre as estatus, count(a.id) as subtotal,
            (SELECT count(a.id) FROM gestion.caso a
    					inner join gestion.denunciante e on e.id = a.id_denunciante
    					inner join lista.ubch z on z.cedula = e.cedula
    					inner JOIN  gestion.estatus i ON i.id = a.id_estatus
    			 		where a.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8) and a.id_sub_categoria in (48))::Text "Total"
      FROM gestion.caso a
            inner join gestion.denunciante e on e.id = a.id_denunciante
            inner join lista.ubch z on z.cedula = e.cedula
            inner JOIN gestion.estatus i ON i.id = a.id_estatus
			      where a.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8) and a.id_sub_categoria in (48)
         group by estatus

SELECT count(a.id) FROM gestion.caso a
					inner join gestion.denunciante e on e.id = a.id_denunciante
					inner join lista.ubch z on z.cedula = e.cedula
					inner JOIN  gestion.estatus i ON a.id_estatus = i.id
			 			where a.id_estatus in (3,4,6,7,8) and a.id_sub_categoria in (48)

-- Casos Recibidos
        SELECT count(a.id) FROM gestion.caso a
					inner join gestion.denunciante e on e.id = a.id_denunciante
					inner join lista.ubch z on z.cedula = e.cedula
					inner JOIN  gestion.estatus i ON a.id_estatus = i.id
			 		where a.id_estatus in (3,4,7,8) and a.id_sub_categoria in (48)

SELECT count(a.id) FROM gestion.caso a
					inner join gestion.denunciante e on e.id = a.id_denunciante
					inner join lista.ubch z on z.cedula = e.cedula
					inner JOIN  gestion.estatus i ON a.id_estatus = i.id
			 where a.id_estatus in (20) and a.id_sub_categoria in (48)

-- Casos Cerrados
 select 
          ec.tx_nom_edo_caso::Text estatus,
          d.tx_nom_sub_categoria::Text servicio,
          count(c.id_caso)::Text subtotal,
          (select count(*) from caso where id_edo_caso in (7))::Text Total
        from 
            caso c 
            inner join edo_caso ec on c.id_edo_caso = ec.id_edo_caso 
            inner join public.caso_sub_categoria d on d.id_caso_sub_categoria = c.id_caso_subcateg
        where 
            ec.id_edo_caso in (7)
            GROUP BY ec.tx_nom_edo_caso, servicio;

SELECT case when m.name is null then c.name else m.name end as sub_categoria, COUNT(a.id) as total 
	         FROM gestion.caso a 
                inner join gestion.category c on c.id = a.id_sub_categoria
                inner join gestion.denunciante e on e.id = a.id_denunciante
                inner join lista.ubch z on z.cedula = e.cedula
			          LEFT JOIN  gestion.category m ON m.id = a.id_extra_categoria               
            where a.id_sub_categoria in (48) and a.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8)
            GROUP BY sub_categoria
            ORDER BY total desc;

SELECT case when m.name is null then c.name else m.name end as sub_categoria, COUNT(a.id) as total 
	         FROM gestion.caso a 
                inner join gestion.category c on c.id = a.id_sub_categoria
                inner join gestion.denunciante e on e.id = a.id_denunciante
                inner join lista.ubch z on z.cedula = e.cedula
				        LEFT JOIN  gestion.category m ON m.id = a.id_extra_categoria               
            where a.id_estatus in (20)
			      and a.id_sub_categoria in (48)
            GROUP BY sub_categoria
            ORDER BY total desc;

select b.nombre as estado, count(a.id) as total
  from gestion.caso a
	          inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
            inner join gestion.denunciante e on e.id = a.id_denunciante
            inner join lista.ubch z on z.cedula = e.cedula
		where  a.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8) and a.id_sub_categoria in (48)
            group by estado order by total desc Limit 10;

select b.nombre as estado, count(a.id) as total
  from gestion.caso a
	          inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
            inner join gestion.denunciante e on e.id = a.id_denunciante
            inner join lista.ubch z on z.cedula = e.cedula
		 where  a.id_estatus in (20) and a.id_sub_categoria in (48)
            group by estado order by total desc Limit 10;

panels.title: REPORTE GENERAL CASO DE VIALIDAD DE UBCH EN EL SISTEMA

targets.rawSql:
SELECT DISTINCT ON (a.nombre) a.nombre::Text "CODIGO CASO", 
      e.cedula::Text "CEDULA", e.nombre::TEXT "DENUNCIANTE",
			e.telefono::Text "TELEFONO", b.nombre::Text "ESTADO", c.nombre::Text "MUNICIPIO", d.nombre::Text "PARROQ", a.descripcion::TEXT "DESCRIP", 
			f.name::Text "CATEGORIA", g.name::Text "SUBCATEG",case when m.name is null then 'Sin ExtCateg' else m.name end::Text "EXTCATEG", 
            case when n.name is null then 'Sin Categ Adi' else n.name end::Text "CATEG ADI",
			i.nombre::Text "ESTATUS",
            case when k.nombre is null then 'Analizando' else k.nombre end::Text "INSTITUCION",
            case when w.first_name is null then 'Analizando' else (w.first_name || ' ' || w.last_name ) end::Text "RESPONSABLE",
			w.phone::Text "TELF. RESP"
            FROM gestion.caso a
            inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
            inner join gestion.municipio c on c.id = a.id_municipio
            inner join gestion.parroquia d on d.id = a.id_parroquia
            inner join gestion.denunciante e on e.id = a.id_denunciante
			      inner join lista.ubch z on z.cedula = e.cedula -- usuario ubch
            inner join gestion.category f on f.id = a.id_categoria
            inner join gestion.category g on g.id = a.id_sub_categoria
            inner JOIN gestion.estatus i ON a.id_estatus = i.id            
            LEFT JOIN  gestion.responsable j ON j.id_caso = a.id
            LEFT JOIN  gestion.resolutorio k ON k.id = j.id_resolutorio 
            LEFT JOIN  public.user w ON w.id = j.id_user
            LEFT JOIN  gestion.category m ON m.id = a.id_extra_categoria
            LEFT JOIN  gestion.category n ON n.id = a.id_adicional_categoria
            where a.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8) and a.id_sub_categoria in (48);

panels.title: LISTADO DE CASOS  DE LA BASE DE DATOS
LISTADO DE CASOS  DE VIALIDAD DE LA BASE DE DATOS (UBCH)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT count(a.id)
	  FROM gestion.caso a
    where  a.id_sub_categoria in (48)
    and a.id_estatus in (3,4,7,8)

SELECT count(a.id)
	  FROM gestion.caso a
    where a.id_sub_categoria in (48)
    and a.id_estatus in (20)

select b.nombre as estado, count(a.id) as total
    from gestion.caso a
	 inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
	 where a.id_sub_categoria in (48)
	 and a.id_estatus in (3,4,7,8)
    group by estado
    order by total desc;

panels.title: CASOS EN PROCESO POR ENT. FEDERALES

targets.rawSql:
select b.nombre as estado, count(a.id) as total
    from gestion.caso a
  	 inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
    where  a.id_sub_categoria in (48) 
    and a.id_estatus in (20)
    group by estado
    order by total desc;

panels.title: REPORTE GENERAL DE VIALIDAD POR ENTIDADES FEDERALES

targets.rawSql:
select b.nombre::Text "ESTADO", 
            count(a.id) as TOTAL
            from gestion.caso a
            inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
            inner join gestion.denunciante e on e.id = a.id_denunciante
            inner join lista.ubch z on z.cedula = e.cedula
		  	where a.id_sub_categoria in (48) and a.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8)
        group by b.nombre order by TOTAL desc

panels.title: TOTAL CASOS DE TRANSPORTE DE UBCH - ENT. FEDERALES (SERVICIOS PRIORIZADOS)

targets.rawSql:
select b.nombre::Text "ESTADO", 
            count(a.id) as TOTAL
            from gestion.caso a
            inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
            inner join gestion.denunciante e on e.id = a.id_denunciante
            inner join lista.ubch z on z.cedula = e.cedula
			 	where a.id_sub_categoria in (48) and a.id_estatus in (20)
        group by b.nombre
        order by TOTAL desc

panels.title: TOTAL CASOS DE TRANSPORTE ATENDIDOS DE  UBCH - ENT. FEDERALES (SERVICIOS PRIORIZADOS)
REPORTE DE CASOS DE VIALIDAD DE UBCH RECIBIDOS-ATENDIDOS (POR ENTIDADES  FEDERALES)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT count(a.id)
	  FROM gestion.caso a
            inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
            inner join gestion.municipio c on c.id = a.id_municipio
		where a.id_sub_categoria in (48)
    and a.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8) 
    and c.id in (22,21,142,148,167,172,190,195,236,265,269,315,327,31,43,67,94,113,121,122,335, 214,250,296)

panels.title: TOTAL CASOS DE TRANSPORTE POR MUN. CAPITALES

targets.rawSql:
SELECT count(a.id)
	  FROM gestion.caso a
            inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
            inner join gestion.municipio c on c.id = a.id_municipio
		where a.id_sub_categoria in (48)
    and a.id_estatus in (20) 
    and c.id in (22,21,142,148,167,172,190,195,236,265,269,315,327,31,43,67,94,113,121,122,335, 214,250,296)

select (c.nombre || ' (' || b.nombre || ')')::Text "MUNICIPIO", 
            count(a.id) as TOTAL
            from gestion.caso a
            inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
            inner join gestion.municipio c on c.id = a.id_municipio
			where a.id_sub_categoria in (48) 
			and a.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8)
      and c.id in (22,21,142,148,167,172,190,195,236,265,269,315,327,31,43,67,94,113,121,122,335, 214,250,296)
	   
        group by c.nombre, b.nombre
        order by TOTAL desc

panels.title: CASOS DE TRANSPORTE POR MUN. CAPITALES

targets.rawSql:
select (c.nombre || ' (' || b.nombre || ')')::Text "MUNICIPIO", 
            count(a.id) as TOTAL
            from gestion.caso a
            inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
            inner join gestion.municipio c on c.id = a.id_municipio
			 where a.id_sub_categoria in (48) and a.id_estatus in (20)
			 and c.id in (22,21,142,148,167,172,190,195,236,265,269,315,327,31,43,67,94,113,121,122,335, 214,250,296)
        group by c.nombre, b.nombre
        order by TOTAL desc

panels.title: REPORTE DE CASOS DE VIALIDAD RECIBIDO-ATENDIDO POR MUNICIPIOS(CAPITALES DE ENTIDADES FEDERALES )

targets.rawSql:
SELECT count(a.id)
	  FROM gestion.caso a
            inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
            inner join gestion.municipio c on c.id = a.id_municipio
		where a.id_sub_categoria in (20)
    and a.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8) 
    and c.id in (127,184,24,32,255,51,182,149,204,20,239,212,290,166)

SELECT count(a.id)
	  FROM gestion.caso a
            inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
            inner join gestion.municipio c on c.id = a.id_municipio
		where a.id_sub_categoria in (48)and a.id_estatus in (20) 
    and c.id in (127,184,24,32,255,51,182,149,204,20,239,212,290,166)

select (c.nombre || ' (' || b.nombre || ')')::Text "MUNICIPIO", 
            count(a.id) as TOTAL
            from gestion.caso a
            inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
            inner join gestion.municipio c on c.id = a.id_municipio
			 where a.id_sub_categoria in (48) and a.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8)
       and c.id in (127,184,24,32,255,51,182,149,204,20,239,212,290,166) 
       group by c.nombre, b.nombre
        order by TOTAL desc

select (c.nombre || ' (' || b.nombre || ')')::Text "MUNICIPIO", 
            count(a.id) as TOTAL
            from gestion.caso a
            inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
            inner join gestion.municipio c on c.id = a.id_municipio
		 where a.id_sub_categoria in (48) and a.id_estatus in (20)
      and c.id in (127,184,24,32,255,51,182,149,204,20,239,212,290,166) 
       group by c.nombre, b.nombre
        order by TOTAL desc

panels.title: REPORTE DE CASOS DE VIALIDAD RECIBIDO-ATENDIDO DE OTROS MUNICIPIOS  (CIUDADES IMPORTANTES)

targets.rawSql:
select (c.nombre || ' (' || b.nombre || ')')::Text "PARROQUIAS", 
            count(a.id) as TOTAL
            from gestion.caso a
            inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
            inner join gestion.parroquia c on c.id = a.id_parroquia
		where a.id_sub_categoria in (48) and a.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8)
    group by c.nombre, b.nombre
    order by TOTAL desc limit 50

select (c.nombre || ' (' || b.nombre || ')')::Text "PARROQUIAS", 
            count(a.id) as TOTAL
            from gestion.caso a
            inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
            inner join gestion.parroquia c on c.id = a.id_parroquia
			where a.id_sub_categoria in (48) and a.id_estatus in (20)
       group by c.nombre, b.nombre
        order by TOTAL desc limit 50

panels.title: REPORTE DE CASOS DE VIALIDAD RECIBIDOS-ATENDIDOS  POR ENTIDADES PARROQUIALES (50 PRIMERAS PARROQUIAS)
